backgroundRationale: ODFW and ISEMP propose to conduct juvenile fish and habitat surveys between and within watersheds stratified by population throughout the John Day basins five major population groups (MPG). ODFW will conduct status and trend basinwide fish and habitat surveys in sites selected using the EMAP GRTS sampling at a rate of 15 new sites per yr, 15 sites repeated annually, and 15 sites repeated every 5 yr for a total of 45 site a year and 165 unique sites every 5 yrs to be surveyed (Table 1). Approximately 8 sites will be selected within each of the five John Day River steelhead populations.

sampleDesigns.title: ISEMP John Day subbasin data analysis - Eco Logical Research
